main.name: Jessica Sisavath
main.description: Hi, I'm Jessica, a full-stack web developer, a speech pathologist, creative thinker/tinkerer, writer, and all around animal lover
main.bio: Full-stack web developer with a background in psychology/English and a Masters in Speech Pathology with a recently earned certificate in full stack development from Rice University Coding Bootcamp. Resourceful and innovative out-of-the-box thinker and tinkerer; passionate about developing intuitive and aesthetically appealing apps with mobile-first design and development. Strengths in critical thinking and problem solving skills, creativity, team collaborations, thriving in fast-paced environments, and building projects from ideation to full execution.
main.contactmessage: *Contact Form in Development*-Please contact me by standard email or phone, would love to chat!

resume.skillmessage: I really enjoy fine-tuning my front-end skills in React, HTML, CSS, and UX design and analyzing and running databases in mySQL.

education.school: Rice University - Full Stack Developer Coding Bootcamp
education.degree: Rice University Full Stack Web Development Certificate
education.description: A 24-week intensive full stack development program focused on gaining in-demand skills through a market-driven curriculum: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Express.js, React.js, Node.js, progressive web apps, agile methodology, computer science, database theory, MongoDB, MySQL, Git and more.

education.school: The University of Texas at Austin at Austin, TX

education.description: Adept in assessment/diagnosis of communication science disorders, research and analysis experience, writing consultant experience

work.title: Speech Pathologist PRN
work.description: Treats and rehabilitates patients for speech therapy deficits expressive and receptive language, swallowing, and neurological disorders in rehab hospitals.

work.title: dedicated student
work.description: 20 hrs/week online course work program that runs for 24-weeks to give students a strong foundation in full stack development

UX/UI Design: Figma, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Lightroom, user research and analysis experience, wireframing experience, responsive design experience
